input.sentences: the family got together for a family reunion .
mom and daughter were very happy .
the sisters were excited to see each other .
output.sentences: Today was the big day, Lucy would finally meet her birth mother
She arrived at the venue and found now just her mum, but a whole family she never knew she had
"Quick! let's get a picture together" said Tina, Lucy's newly found mother
Lucy met a half sister, a cousin and even grandparents
To end the day, she looked at pictures of herself as a baby with her mother, before she was put up for adoption
